alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 25 at 12:10PM AKDT until July 27 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO NOON AKDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect from 6 AM Tuesday to noon AKDT Wednesday. * LOCATION...Kotzebue Sound including Kotzebue. * TIMING...Tuesday morning to Noon Wednesday. The highest water levels are expected between 6 PM and 10 PM Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Objects left on the beach could be washed away. Minor beach erosion will occur. * WAVE AND SURF...Sea levels will rise 3 to 4 feet above the normal high tides. Waves will wash up to the top of the beach.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.
